content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (x=52.5, y=-84.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5) containing 259 units of coal.
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0) with no fuel, extracting coal and storing it in the wooden chest.

### Copper Plate Production Facility at Position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0) fueled with 13 units of coal, extracting copper ore and iron ore, but output is blocked.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-23.0, y=-66.0) fueled with 50 units of coal, but has no ingredients to smelt.

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5) containing 230 units of iron ore.
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0) with no fuel, extracting iron ore and storing it in the wooden chest.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0) fueled with 42 units of coal, producing iron plates.
- Wooden Chest at position (x=1.5, y=0.5) with no inventory.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=2.5, y=0.5) fueled with 9 units of coal, waiting for source items from the wooden chest.

### Belt Group
Consists of the following:
- Belt from position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-56.5) and from (x=-17.5, y=-57.5) to (x=-17.5, y=-59.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when picking up entities
- Ensure the entity you want to pick up exists at the specified position before attempting to pick it up.

### Errors when connecting entities with belts
- Verify that the entities you are trying to connect are correctly initialized and not NoneType. Ensure that the entities have valid attributes before attempting to connect them with belts.
